trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_SEQ_00<tab>Sphene has a pained look in her eyes.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Krile in the Backroom.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Sphene.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_WUKLAMAT_000_000<tab>...
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_GULOOLJA_000_001<tab>What a cruel thing to say to Sphene...
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_010<tab>Alexandria has no need for Queen Sphene. It's the Queen of Reason─my Endless counterpart─that they love.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_011<tab>And although it is a hard truth to accept...it is nevertheless the truth. I must find a new way to serve...
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_GULOOLJA_000_012<tab>You're not alone. And together, we can get through anything.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_WUKLAMAT_000_017<tab>Well said. And it just so happens there's something that only you can do right this moment...
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_WUKLAMAT_200_017<tab>Let's start with Calyx. What can you tell us about him?

TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_018<tab>He was a prodigy who specialized in the field of electrope and made his mark during the Storm Surge. Yet even as he basked in the admiration of his peers, he struggled with an illness he had from birth, which left him with precious little time to live.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_019<tab>For him to still be here four centuries on, I think it safe to assume that he too has become an Endless.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_WUKLAMAT_000_020<tab>I see... While we're somewhat familiar with Preservation, I never imagined we'd cross paths with one of them like this.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_021<tab>You know about Preservation?
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_WUKLAMAT_000_022<tab>We do. They're supposed to have created Everkeep's core system as well as the Endless Sphene.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_023<tab>Did they? All while I was slumbering...
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_GULOOLJA_000_024<tab>The members of Oblivion have spent a lot of time investigating Preservation. We should head to the Backroom and tell them what's happened.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_WUKLAMAT_000_025<tab>We've given the others a summary, but we can wait on the details if you need some rest.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_GULOOLJA_000_026<tab>Are you feeling alright?
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_027<tab>To think that Krile's parents were once members of Preservation...
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_GRAHATIA_000_028<tab>We heard about the ambush. You seem to have weathered it well, but try to avoid straining yourself, do you hear me?
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_SHALE_000_029<tab>The sign might yield some clues...
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_WUKLAMAT_000_030<tab>At last we have a plan. Let's make it count!
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_GULOOLJA_000_031<tab>According to the records from Yuweyawata, my mother was investigating Origenics for her own research into souls.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_GULOOLJA_000_032<tab>There was map data for Origenics in the records, and that's how we learned about the castle in the foundation sector.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_KRILE_000_033<tab>Calyx determines how many will become Endless, but leaves the choice of who in the hands of the people...
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_KRILE_100_033<tab>Is this his idea of fairness, or does he simply not care? Perhaps he considers all to be worthy of salvation...? Oh, but it's too early for such speculation...

TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_GRAHATIA_000_034<tab>In the world of Sphene's memories, the town was already submerged. Given their dire circumstances, I expect the people considered stripping the castle for materials to rebuild.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_GRAHATIA_000_035<tab>For the structure to endure even now... It speaks to its importance to the Alexandrians, as well as their resilience.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_SHALE_000_036<tab>I'm working on securing a route to the foundation sector. Please sit tight for a while.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_040<tab>Thank you for allowing me to accompany you.
TEXT_KINGMH105_05303_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_041<tab>It may take time for me to find my place in this new Alexandria, but I will. Slowly but surely.
